org.apache.flex.abc.semantics

Class MethodBodyInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.abc.semantics.MethodBodyInfo

  • public class MethodBodyInfo
extends Object
    A representation of a method's method body information.

      • getBlock

        public IBasicBlock getBlock(Label target)
        Get the block that the label corresponds to. Will throw an IllegalArgumentException if the label does not correspond to any known block.
        Parameters:
        target - the label you want the block for
        Returns:
        the block that the label refers to.

      • getBlock

        public IBasicBlock getBlock(Label target,
                   boolean throwOnError)
        Get the block that the label corresponds to. Will throw an IllegalArgumentException if the label does not correspond to any known block, and throwOnError is true.
        Parameters:
        target - the label you want the block for
        throwOnError - false if you do not want this method to throw an IllegalArgumentException - in this case the method will return null instead.
        Returns:
        the block that the label refers to.

      • getExceptions

        public List<ExceptionInfo> getExceptions()
        Returns:
        exception handlers defined in this method.

      • isCatchTarget

        public boolean isCatchTarget(Label l)
        Does the given Label reference a catch target?
        Parameters:
        l - - the Label of interest.
        Returns:
        true if the Label references a catch target, either by identity or by position.

      • setInstructionList

        public void setInstructionList(InstructionList new_list)
        Set this method body's InstructionList. Used by code generators that build up an InstructionList from smaller parts; not relevant if the InstructionList is built by visitInstruction() calls on this object.

      • getInstructionList

        public InstructionList getInstructionList()
        Returns:
        this method body's InstructionList.
